title: Cutting Costs for Hospitals: Value Beyond Price with A Comprehensive Energy Portfolio
author: Questex Partner
description: In the wake of COVID-19, hospitals are challenged with rising costs, staffing shortages and backlogs of postponed surgeries. | Many surgeries involve instruments that use energy to seal and transect tissue for better bleeding control. Deciding which energy devices to invest in could make a difference to the bottom line
